concept.title: Book map metadata elements
concept.shortdesc: The book map specialization supports standard book production. This section contains the metadata elements used by bookmap to store book-related metadata.

conbody.note: The OASIS document type for the bookmap specialization includes the xNAL domain for describing the author or authors of a document. All elements that appear in that domain (the authorinformation element and all of its descendants) are described in the xNAL domain section, rather than in this bookmap metadata section.
